Weapon Proficiency: Dagger; Dart; Light Crossbow; Quarterstaff; Sling

Thrown Arms Master: +20/+40 thrown weapon range
Cruel: Can use 1 cruelty die for +1d6 damage on a hit or to gain 1d6 temporary hit points on a critical hit
Cruel: Can use 6 cruelty dice per long rest
Remarkable Recovery: Healing and stabilization performed on self restore +4 hit points
Thrown Arms Master: Can throw any weapon; one-handed weapons have range 20/60, two-handed weapons 15/30, and light weapons return after a missed throw
Vital Sacrifice: Can suffer 1d6 HP necrotic to gain +1d6 on an attack, to inflict +2d6 HP necrotic, or to inflict -1d4 on a foe Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution save, within 1 hr
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom

Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 9 Spell DC: W: 17
Spells:
Arcane Gate (W6 Conj): R10' Creates a portal pair that can teleport creatures 500' for concentration up to 10 min
Blight (W4 Necr): R30' Inflicts 8d8 HP necrotic (save Constitution half; plant target has disadvantage on the save and suffers maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Blindness/Deafness (W2 Necr): R30' Inflicts a choice of blindness or deafness (save Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Cloudkill (W5 Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (save Constitution half) and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (W4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Dancing Lights (W0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Expeditious Retreat (W1 Tran): Self gains a bonus Dash once per rd for concentration up to 10 min
Feeblemind (W8 Ench): R150' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic and reduction of Charisma and Intelligence to 1 (save Intelligence HP only; failure allows additional saves every 30 days)
Finger Of Death (W7 Necr): R60' Target suffers 7d8+30 HP necrotic (save Constitution half) and becomes an obedient zombie if killed
Fire Bolt (W0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Gust Of Wind (W2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (save Strength negates), inflicts half movement, and has a 50% chance of extinguishing flames for concentration up to 1 min
Hypnotic Pattern (W3 Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become incapacitated (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min; taking damage ends the effects
Identify (Mystic Conflux1 [Mystic Conflux] Divi): Reveals the magic properties or spells affecting touched [R]
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Magic Jar (W6 Necr): R100' Moves self soul to a prepared jar from which it can possess a target's body and trap its soul in the jar (save Charisma negates)
Magic Weapon (W2 Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level gives a +2 or +3 bonus at level 4 or 6]
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound (W4 Conj): R30' Creates an invisible watchdog that barks at Small or larger intruders within 30' and attacks those within 5' (password negates) with a +9 bite that inflicts 4d8 HP piercing for 8 hr
Prismatic Spray (W7 Evoc): 60' cone randomly inflicts one of: 10d6 HP fire, acid, lightning, poison, or cold (save Dexterity half); restrained (save Dexterity negates) and petrified after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes negates); blinded (save Dexterity negates) and banished to another plane (save Wisdom negates)
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Silent Image (W1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of actions (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides a link to similar circles for 1 rd
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3'x1" force disk floats 3' above the ground 20' behind self and holds 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
Time Stop (W9 Tran): Self can take 1d4+1 turns while no time passes for others; affecting another creature or moving more than 1000' away ends
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 5 maximum) at the end of a short rest once per long rest
Empowered Evocation: +3 HP evocation spell damage
Evocation Savant: Requires half the normal time and cost to copy evocation spells into spellbook
Flash Recall: Can replace a prepared spell once per short rest
Mystic Conflux: Can attune 4 items and can cast Identify once per long rest
Overchannel: Can inflict maximum damage from evocation spells up to level 5; additional uses before a long rest also inflict necrotic damage on self, starting at 2d12 HP and increasing by 1d12 HP on each successive use
Potent Cantrip: Cantrips inflict half HP on a successful save
Sculpt Spells: Can give spell level + 1 creatures a successful save and no damage instead of half on a self spell
Signature Spells: Can cast 2 chosen W3 spells without spending a spell slot once per short rest
Spell Mastery: Can cast a chosen W1 spell and a chosen W2 spell at will and change the choices after 8 hr of study
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Spelldriver: Can cast an additional level 1 or 2 spell once per rd
Notes
Validation Errors: Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
